text: Ara tomadera sadhya ne'i ye tomara stridera madhye samabyabahara karabe, yadi'o tomara akanaksa karo. Kintu bitaraga hayo na puropuri biragabhajane, yara phale take phele rakho yena jhulanta abasthaya. Ara yadi tomara samajhotha karo ebam, tabe nihsandeha allah hacchena paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
